verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> also came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, thou dwellest <WH3427> <WH8802> in the midst <WH8432> of a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, which have eyes <WH5869> to see <WH7200> <WH8800>, and see <WH7200> <WH8804> not; they have ears <WH241> to hear <WH8085> <WH8800>, and hear <WH8085> <WH8804> not: for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.

Therefore, thou son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, prepare <WH6213> <WH8798> thee stuff <WH3627> for removing <WH1473>, and remove <WH1540> <WH8798> by day <WH3119> in their sight <WH5869>; and thou shalt remove <WH1540> <WH8804> from thy place <WH4725> to another <WH312> place <WH4725> in their sight <WH5869>: it may be they will consider <WH7200> <WH8799>, though they be a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.

Then shalt thou bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> thy stuff <WH3627> by day <WH3119> in their sight <WH5869>, as stuff <WH3627> for removing <WH1473>: and thou shalt go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> at even <WH6153> in their sight <WH5869>, as they that go forth <WH4161> into captivity <WH1473>.
Dig <WH2864> <WH8798> thou through the wall <WH7023> in their sight <WH5869>, and carry out <WH3318> <WH8689> thereby.

In their sight <WH5869> shalt thou bear <WH5375> <WH8799> it upon thy shoulders <WH3802>, and carry it forth <WH3318> <WH8686> in the twilight <WH5939>: thou shalt cover <WH3680> <WH8762> thy face <WH6440>, that thou see <WH7200> <WH8799> not the ground <WH776>: for I have set <WH5414> <WH8804> thee for a sign <WH4159> unto the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And I did <WH6213> <WH8799> so as I was commanded <WH6680> <WH8795>: I brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> my stuff <WH3627> by day <WH3119>, as stuff <WH3627> for captivity <WH1473>, and in the even <WH6153> I digged <WH2864> <WH8804> through the wall <WH7023> with mine hand <WH3027>; I brought it forth <WH3318> <WH8689> in the twilight <WH5939>, and I bare <WH5375> <WH8804> it upon my shoulder <WH3802> in their sight <WH5869>.
And in the morning <WH1242> came the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, hath not the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, the rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, said <WH559> <WH8804> unto thee, What doest <WH6213> <WH8802> thou?

Say <WH559> <WH8798> thou unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; This burden <WH4853> concerneth the prince <WH5387> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and all the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> that are among <WH8432> them.

Say <WH559> <WH8798>, I am your sign <WH4159>: like as I have done <WH6213> <WH8804>, so shall it be done <WH6213> <WH8735> unto them: they shall remove <WH1473> and go <WH3212> <WH8799> into captivity <WH7628>.

And the prince <WH5387> that is among <WH8432> them shall bear <WH5375> <WH8799> upon his shoulder <WH3802> in the twilight <WH5939>, and shall go forth <WH3318> <WH8799>: they shall dig <WH2864> <WH8799> through the wall <WH7023> to carry out <WH3318> <WH8687> thereby: he shall cover <WH3680> <WH8762> his face <WH6440>, that <WH3282> he see <WH7200> <WH8799> not the ground <WH776> with his eyes <WH5869>.

My net <WH7568> also will I spread <WH6566> <WH8804> upon him, and he shall be taken <WH8610> <WH8738> in my snare <WH4686>: and I will bring <WH935> <WH8689> him to Babylon <WH894> to the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>; yet shall he not see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, though he shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> there.

And I will scatter <WH2219> <WH8762> toward every wind <WH7307> all that are about <WH5439> him to help <WH5828> him, and all his bands <WH102>; and I will draw out <WH7324> <WH8686> the sword <WH2719> after <WH310> them.
And they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>, when I shall scatter <WH6327> <WH8687> them among the nations <WH1471>, and disperse <WH2219> <WH8765> them in the countries <WH776>.

But I will leave <WH3498> <WH8689> a few <WH4557> men <WH582> of them from the sword <WH2719>, from the famine <WH7458>, and from the pestilence <WH1698>; that they may declare <WH5608> <WH8762> all their abominations <WH8441> among the heathen <WH1471> whither they come <WH935> <WH8804>; and they shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came to me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, eat <WH398> <WH8799> thy bread <WH3899> with quaking <WH7494>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> thy water <WH4325> with trembling <WH7269> and with carefulness <WH1674>;

And say <WH559> <WH8804> unto the people <WH5971> of the land <WH127>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> of the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and of the land <WH776> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>; They shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> their bread <WH3899> with carefulness <WH1674>, and drink <WH8354> <WH8799> their water <WH4325> with astonishment <WH8078>, that her land <WH776> may be desolate <WH3456> <WH8799> from all that is therein <WH4393>, because of the violence <WH2555> of all them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein.

And the cities <WH5892> that are inhabited <WH3427> <WH8737> shall be laid waste <WH2717> <WH8799>, and the land <WH776> shall be desolate <WH8077>; and ye shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I am the YY <WH3068>.
And the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, what is that proverb <WH4912> that ye have in the land <WH127> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, The days <WH3117> are prolonged <WH748> <WH8799>, and every vision <WH2377> faileth <WH6> <WH8804> ?

Tell <WH559> <WH8798> them therefore, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; I will make this proverb <WH4912> to cease <WH7673> <WH8689>, and they shall no more use it as a proverb <WH4911> <WH8799> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>; but say <WH1696> <WH8761> unto them, The days <WH3117> are at hand <WH7126> <WH8804>, and the effect <WH1697> of every vision <WH2377>.
For there shall be no more any vain <WH7723> vision <WH2377> nor flattering <WH2509> divination <WH4738> within <WH8432> the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For I am the YY <WH3068>: I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, and the word <WH1697> that I shall speak <WH1696> <WH8762> shall come to pass <WH6213> <WH8735>; it shall be no more prolonged <WH4900> <WH8735>: for in your days <WH3117>, O rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, will I say <WH1696> <WH8762> the word <WH1697>, and will perform <WH6213> <WH8804> it, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
Again the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came to me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, behold, they of the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> say <WH559> <WH8802>, The vision <WH2377> that he seeth <WH2372> <WH8802> is for many <WH7227> days <WH3117> to come, and he prophesieth <WH5012> <WH8738> of the times <WH6256> that are far <WH7350> off.

Therefore say <WH559> <WH8798> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>; There shall none of my words <WH1697> be prolonged <WH4900> <WH8735> any more, but the word <WH1697> which I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8762> shall be done <WH6213> <WH8735>, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.
